items.title: Seth Godin on Presenting to Persuade
items.headline: Build your business, make your point, sell your idea
objectives_summary: You'll discover the fundamental flaw built into the software, you'll see how you can use a presentation to make a huge impact, and most of all, you'll have a new tool to make change happen. People who have adopted this powerful approach have gotten funded, promoted, seen, heard and most of all, made a difference.

Know exactly how many clients you need to reach your financial and lifestyle goals
Have a clear process to take each client through so you can stop reinventing the wheel with each client
